mapper.insert: /** 관리자 행동로그 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogAdmin */ INSERT INTO tb_log_admin (admin_id, log_code, result_code, value1, value2, value3) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{logCode}, #{resultCode}, #{value1}, #{value2}, #{value3})

/** 익명사용자 행동로그 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogAnonymous */ INSERT INTO tb_log_anonymous (anonymous_access, log_code, result_code, value1, value2) VALUES (#{anonymousAccess}, #{logCode}, #{resultCode}, #{value1}, #{value2})

/** 아동 행동로그 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogChild */ INSERT INTO tb_log_child (child_id, guardian_id, log_code, result_code, gold, dia, screening, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5) VALUES (#{childId}, #{guardianId}, #{logCode}, #{resultCode}, #{gold}, #{dia}, #{screening}, #{value1}, #{value2}, #{value3}, #{value4}, #{value5})

/** 관리자 행동로그 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogManager */ INSERT INTO tb_log_manager (manager_id, log_code, result_code, gold, dia, screening, value1, value2, value3) VALUES (#{managerId}, #{logCode}, #{resultCode}, #{gold}, #{dia}, #{screening}, #{value1}, #{value2}, #{value3})

/** 보호자 행동로그 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogGuardian */ INSERT INTO tb_log_guardian (guardian_id, log_code, result_code, value1, value2, value3) VALUES (#{guardianId}, #{logCode}, #{resultCode}, #{value1}, #{value2}, #{value3})
/** 로그 코드 삽입 ActionLogMapper.xml id = insertLogCode */ INSERT INTO tb_code_log (log_code, log_description) VALUES (#{logCode}, #{logDescription})
